mapper.delete: DELETE FROM priority.priority_order_result_data WHERE company_cd = #{companyCd} and priority_order_cd = #{priorityOrderCd}
mapper.select: select branch_amount, unit_before_diff,sale_forecast, branch_num,rank_prop,jan_old,branch_num_upd,attr2,unit_price, jan_new,attr1,attr3,mulit_attr,pos_amount_upd,pos_before_rate,rank,difference,coalesce(sku, '_') sku,pos_amount,rank_upd, attr4,attr5,attr6,attr7,attr8,attr9,goods_rank from priority.priority_order_result_data where priority_order_cd=#{priorityOrderCd} and company_cd=#{companyCd}
